name: Descent (UntitledDev_)
description:
Objective
Dodge the spiked obstacles for as long as you can to score points!

How To Play

  • Press Space to start the game on the title screen
  • Use the Left Arrow key and the Right Arrow to move
  • Press R key to restart the game when you die

Developer's Note

Thank you for taking your time to play my game, if you can please feel free to follow me on Twitter @UntitledDev_ to see updates on my future games.
